Protected Sub New (Optional maxDelay As Nullable(Of TimeSpan) = Nothing, Optional jitterFactor As Double = 0.2)
new Azure.Core.DelayStrategy : Nullable<TimeSpan> * double -> Azure.Core.DelayStrategy

Docs.param: The max delay value to apply on an individual delay.

The jitter factor to apply to each delay. For example, if the delay is 1 second with a jitterFactor of 0.2, the actual delay used will be a random double between 0.8 and 1.2. If set to 0, no jitter will be applied.
Docs.summary: Constructs a new instance of . This constructor can be used by derived classes to customize the jitter factor and max delay.

Docs.param: The response, if any, returned from the service.

Docs.param: The response, if any, returned from the service.
Docs.summary: Gets the next delay interval. Implement this method to provide custom delay logic. The Max Delay, jitter, and any Retry-After headers will be applied to the value returned from this method.
Docs.returns: A representing the next delay interval.
